ygData.subject: RE: Twinking & Kiting
ygData.msgSnippet: Did you not see the part about already having a character at level 50.  I would only do/condone this if its a second character.  Plus, what s wrong with
ygData.messageBody:
Did you not see the part about already having a character at level 50. I
would only do/condone this if its a second character. Plus, what's wrong
with powergaming if that is how someone has fun then good for them, they
spent money on something that is fun. Role-playing is not the holy grail,
having enjoyment is. It's a game.

I really hate flames so I'm not going to continue this thread since it seems
like it will become a flame war.

Fidan
Level 5 Cleric
with Legit Full Banded
"Pottery pays very well"

-----Original Message-----
From: The Scotts [mailto:jtscott@...]
Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 11:21 AM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Twinking & Kiting


From: "The Scotts" <jtscott@...>

Straight out why do it what in the hell is the point in
getting to lvl 50 that fast you dont learn how to use your charater worth
shit. Wow your lvl 50 now what?? Its senseless I have a lvl 24 cleric
(human) and I know norrath better than any lvl 50 charater who has lvled in
this way, the game was intended for you to explore and learn and lvl not to
get to lvl 50 in a matter of days. And aboiut the guilds that condone this
and especially help their members to do this are just a disgrace to all
guilds. Personnaly it sounds like the alll the power gamers who came from UO
and jsut want a full guild of lvl 50 characters. Go ahead do it but your
screwing the whole game for yourself.


-----Original Message-----
From: KAUFFMAN,ROBERT (HP-FtCollins,ex1) <robert_kauffman@...>
To: 'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com' <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 11:45 AM
Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] Twinking & Kiting


>From: "KAUFFMAN,ROBERT (HP-FtCollins,ex1)" <robert_kauffman@...>
>
>I can see a great reason to do it. You have a guild that is all high level
>characters. You've played a character to level 50 and want to try a
>different class but want to play with your guild. Makes sense to me.
>
>Fidan
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Azor [mailto:jmaynus@...]
>Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 9:34 AM
>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Twinking & Kiting
>
>
>From: "Azor" <jmaynus@...>
>
>I don't really see why anyone would want to do this stuff. I mean I like
to
>earn my Lvls not have them handed to me. I either solo stuff I can kill
>thats blue or black to me or I get in a group, which lately I've been
>grouping, daytime I'm soloing then around 6pm or 7 I'm in a group till
about
>12a to 1 or later. I can understand having a friend help you out with
money
>and a better weapon or armor but thats about as far as I'd go. I wouldn't
>want to be Lvl 4 with a full suit of Ruby, maybe banded and thats it. I'm
>now Lvl 18 and I wear Banded, Chain and Mesh armor, some of it I bought and
>other parts friends gave to me to help me out.
>
>**************************
>Azor
>Lvl 18 Human Cleric of the Rathe
>**************************
>
>
>> From: "Mr. J Daniels" <warpig@...>
>>
>> Its not impossible, I'll see about getting the screnshot, the guy is
>> level 33 now tho and hasnt played as much, he may be up to around 15
days.
>>
>> (It can be done)
>>
>> Mr. J Daniels
